channel.description: Recent content in Maya on Tony Kim | Blog & Portfolio

item.title: Troubleshooting Broken UV: Transfer Vertex Order
item.description: Broken UV I had an issue of broken UV when I copied a UV map of an object to another object, which in most cases is the duplicated object, with Transfer Attributes.

item.title: Copying a UV map to multiple objects in Maya
item.description: How to copy a UV map to multiple duplicated objects at once with Python script in Maya When modeling objects, we duplicate an object multiple times and realize ‘Oh, I forgot to unwrap the UV!
